original_title: 映画ジュエルペット　スウィーツダンスプリンセス
overview: Ruby and her friends are in full drive preparing for Princess Mana's birthday party in Sweetsland. While preparing for her birthday party, a mysterious item falls out from the sky. Inside the mysterious item, a Sweetspet boy appears ...
title: Jewelpet the Movie: Sweets Dance Princess
